description: Drizzled with garlic and lime, this prawn omelette with hints of chilli packs a flavour punch. Serve up this simple meal for breakfast, lunch or dinner.
name: Chilli Prawn Omelette Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g green King prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact
5ml extra virgin olive oil cooking spray

recipeInstructions.text: Spray prawns with oil. Heat a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add prawns. Cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until prawns have changed in colour and begun to curl. Sprinkle with chilli flakes. Transfer to a bowl.

Return pan to medium-high heat. Pour of the egg mixture into the pan. Swirl to cover base of pan. Cook for 3 minutes or until just set and golden brown underneath. Slide onto a serving plate. Repeat to make 4 omelettes in total.
Top each omelette with carrot, onion, sprouts, coriander, basil and prawns. Fold omelettes over to partially cover filling.
Juice 1 lime. Whisk juice, oil and garlic in a jug. Drizzle over omelettes. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Cut remaining lime into cheeks. Serve with omelettes.
